demos.text: It has been my first choice ever since I discovered it .
demos.reasoning: The text expresses a positive sentiment towards a particular choice that the speaker has made, indicating satisfaction and preference.

demos.text: I've been there a few times, and I usually end up sitting next to some pretty odd people.
Its fast and another thing I like is that it has three USB ports.
Its a good laptop for its value.
I am not much of a computer techie, so I can understand some of the internal problems, though I do have trend micro as an antiviral program.
Sauce was watery and the food didn't have much flavor.
If you wrote a bad review, it's because you don't understand what Rao's is all about.
the mouse pad and buttons are the worst i've ever seen.
